Name change in pa is a pain. I would get a lawyer as I did for mine. Mazzoni center legal services will help you for little or no cost at all.
Only if you want to. I am going for srs in 11 months and I am not forcing myself to lose it at all if it happens it happens.

I do have kinda long hair it's down to my shoulders and I don't have any facial hair I got rid of that awile agao by right now I still present male so I can't do to much more then that
My skin is clear I use hot water in the morning and stridex. As for my hair I use shampoo and conditioner and then put in a thermal protector and straighten my hair.

WRITING.TITLE: 7 months hrt and still don't pass :( what to do?
WRITING.TEXT: So I have been on hrt for just about 7 momths and I still don't even pass and look like complete crap. I don't know what to do it has been leading me to be more depressed and just hating my self becouse I feel like I will never pass at all and and look like crap. So has anyone else been on hrt for awhile and still not pass at my age or is this just me? What should I do just stop hrt as i feel like I have no hope of ever passing?
I found mine in a trans kik group. We were only friends at first but we both developed romantic feelings for each other and then started dating. Try using dating apps.

So I am 5'7" ish and I am 108 and have been diagnosed with anorexia and hrt has not helped me gain weight at all. It is really a ymmv thing as my doctor said. I have tried to gain weight but I have not been able to I have actually lost a bit of weight since starting hrt.

WRITING.TITLE: Where do I file for my name and gender change?
WRITING.TEXT: 1.Alright so I want to file for my legal gender change and I don't know witch state I would file in because I was born in Ny witch doesn't require srs to have it changed on your birth Certificate but I live in Pa witch requires srs for a gender change on your birth cerfificate. So witch state do I file in for the my legal gender change? 2. So I want to change my name to legally so as I said I was born in Ny but live in Pa so would I file in NY or Pa or doesn't matter?
Nope i changed my gender from female to male and nobody noticed. The only time somebody noticed is when i put the transflag as my banner and it was only one person.
Congrats
I have not used the boybreifs form aerie but i have used the bikin ones and they are pretty good for tucking never really had a problem begin tucked in them.
I have probley spent around $250 dollars on electro it was $45 every 30min or 80 for an hour and i still have a little bit of hair left to go.

WRITING.TITLE: Asexual after on hrt
WRITING.TEXT: So pre hrt I identified as heterosexual gray-romantic(noticed it around the time I noticed I was trans also)male. so I been on hrt for almost 5 months and recently I noticed I was asexual. So has this happens to anybody else? And could this be do to genital dysphoria?

Well I am 17 I am not attracted to males at all. He might become isolated at points I have for a couple of days I barley left me room but that has really changed I am back to normal. Pre hrt I was not femme at all I never crossed my legs and I play shooter and I guess what you could call violent games online. If he does not want to share girl culture it perfectly fine some afab do to and he might share it later he might not be a butch lesbian.
I am only 17 turn 18 in 2 weeks.
I don't have a lot of clothes and with school and work would not work and I don't know make up at all.

WRITING.TITLE: Worried my doctor will take me off of hrt
WRITING.TEXT: So last time I went to my doctor he told me that If I don't talk to my parents more he will take me off of hrt. Then he asked when will I start presenting female I told him January but I have put it off of may. So I am worried that I will be taken off of hrt and I don't know what to do? My appt is in 3 weeks also.
Ok then what after that?
Yeah that's my goal and to look decent also I mean I know I am still early but yeah and no I never had my eyebrows done.
I mean I have $115 dollars on amazon there are some pictures on reddit just look through my post. I can pm you a picture just don't want to post one.
I have continued it I am going to wait till classes are over in may to social transition because I would have more changes and would give me more to do so between semsters.
Its fine.
